div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiij die
Julij quo Supra

Eodem die comparuit margareta marioria Waus soror et heres apparens quondam
Johannis Waus in futy et fecit constituit creauit Richardum Waus suum
legittimum procuratorem Irrevocabilem ad Impetrandum breuia Capelle Regie de et super
terris et annuis redditibus sibi racione decessus dicti quondam fratris suj contingen' eadem
debit' execucionj de mandan' Retornat' remittend' Capelle Regie litteram sasine
Impetrand' sasinam earundem terrarum et annuorum Reddituum acceptandum
ac Jure hereditario bona petend' et recipiend' cartas inde sibi heredibus
suis et suis assignatis confici causand' Sigilloque et proprio a Dauid theman
aurifabro de mandato dicte constituentis sigiland' et in proprios versus dicti
Ricardi conuertend' promitten' de Rato et grato sub penis periurij et Infamie ac
ypotheca omnium bonorum suorum et si Reuocare contigerit quod absit omnia premissa approbat
et Ratificat tociens quociens In vberiore forma procuratorij Insuper dictus Ricardus
Sigillum rum et sigillum Andree Cullane balliui presenti Instrumenti Instanti procurauit
Actum In pretorio hora quasi xja ante meridiem testibus Willelmo portar Johanne mar' patricio
chernsid' Willelmo Wormet Willelmo buchane thoma narne Johanne
meldrum Johanne anand' thoma grig seriando et Johanne Williamsone Judicatore Curie

The saide day Richard Waus grantit to thomas Waus his Eme
the half of al landis and gudis of Airschip and wyn gudis that may
be Recouerit and optenit throw richt of mariory Waus sistir and appe
ring ayr' to vmquhile Jonhne Waus quhome god assolye the
said' thomas makand' the half of the costis tharapone
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die Julij quo Supra

The saide day Jonhne talyour' in the gallowgat grantit him Souerte for ij
merkis of maile aving to the lard of many of the terme bigan Ande
philp Dunbrek sergeand' at commavnde of the balyeis chargit the saide Johne
to Reman within the tolbutht quhile he pait the saide tua markis

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne Culane
forspekar that lucas seruand' to henry scot sal pay j barrel of tar' to Jonhne
Wil yongsone or caus' it to be pait

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne
of Cullane forspekar that nay tougnethis sal fische apone the
kingis wattiris vnto the the first mary day and gif ony beis
fundyne thar the nethis salbe eschetis to the aldirman and the tone'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die mensis
augusti anno quo Supra

the saide day Jonhne Kennartj in ane amerciament of the Court be his tounge
grant for the strubulance of Androw archebald' and the saide Androw quyt
of al strubulance of the saide Johne for the amendis of the quhilkis the
saide Jonhne sal pay j barrel wax to the haly blude licht Ande gif
euir the saide Jonhne committis ony strubulance to the saide Androw or till
ony vthiris in tyme to Cum and beis conuikit tharof he sal pay xl s'
to Sanct nicholes werk be the deliuerance of ane assis' William
goldsmitht' forspekar

Eodem die Robertus blinsel deuenit plegius legalis quod Andreas Arche
baldi erit Indempnis pro Johanne Kennartj aliter quam per viam Juris Et thomas
mar' deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro dicto Andrea aliter
quam per viam Juris Et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad releuandum suos plegios
et conseruandum eos Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione Insuper dictus Johannes
se obligauit Collum suum in Collistrigio locare et Imponere si plegii
legales Infringere contigerit

The saide day James Kintor oblist him be the fath of his bodie to pay
demi barrell of Salmond' to thome menyeis within xv dais for thomas
fif

The saide day paule Cutellar' was in ane Amerciament for the wranguis'
strubulance of Alexander sanquhar' and be ane suorne assis' William blinsele
forspekar' Ande gif euir he committis ony strubulance to the saide Alexander or til
ony vthiris and beis conuikit tharof salbe secludit the tone

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsel forspekar that Alexander scrogis sall pay j barrel salmond' and j barrel
of girls' or ellis vj merkis scottis money furthtwith but delay
to Wille blinsell be his tong gravnt to the assis'
Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die Augusti

The saide day William moir' grantit that he hede sellit to Robert futhes
tua scheip and deliuerit tham to him out of mekile clyntertay and resavit pament
for tham And' oblist him be his hand to keipe the saide Robert skathles
tharanent

the saide day the balyes assignit Dauid Kintor to ansuer to the borghe
strekit one him be William smyth anent the wranguis' haldin fra
him of his bill and the money of the Samyn one tuysday the
xxij day of August Instant gif the said partiis agreit nocht eftir
nowne

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
Augusti quo supra

the saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne
assis' Alexander Rede forspekar that and it plesis Jonhne hwme Dauison' to haue
the toll that Jonhne Dauisone hvme bocht fra Dauid nory that he gyf him
the siluer that he gaf for it and he sal haue the toll

The saide day comperit Alexander branche and maid' mathow branche
his brothir his lauchfule procurator to resaue his barnyspart of gudis fra
his modir and keipe it quhill his hame gif his modir will nocht
fynde Sufficient Souerte to the said mathow duelland' within
this burghe that the saide barnyspart' of gudis be kepit and the
Souerte be responsale tharofor as efferis of law and resone
And' atour gif his modir will deliuer the said barnyspart of gudis
to the saide mathow the saide alexander is content and makis his brothir
to the resat of the Samyn Alsua gif it happinnis his modir
to resaue cleithis hir' with ane husband' than in continent the saide
alexander makis his saide brothir his lauchful procurator tile ask and
resaue ale gudis pertening to him be deces' of his fadir in the souerast
wys' cane be diuisit of procuratory with ful pouer to do follow and defend'
and of his resatis acquitance to gif et cetera promittand' to halde ferme and
Stabile et cetera apone the quhilkis the saide mathow askit Instrument
befor thir witnes Alexander Rede Androw Cullan Robert' Cullan balyeis
patrik chernsid' patrik Rede William smytht' and Alexander lovnan et cetera

the saide day Robert Cullane Come Souerte to William smyth for
Dauid Kintor yongar to pay to the factouris or procuratouris of the saide
Williamis in zeland' fyftene s' g' and tene g' Ande Will rolland'
Come dettour be his hand vphaldin to pay xl s' to the saide Wil
yeame smyth tharof xxx s' or to morne at evin and x s' within viij or
x dais

The saide day It was fundin deliuerit and ordanit be the aldirman
and diuers' of the Consal lynars' that Androw lammyntone sal keip mathow branchis
hous' dry of his eys'drop

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die
mensis augusti quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday cum xv
dais to Jonhne Wormet to ansuer' to the borghe' strekit
one him be Jonhne lammyntone for the wranguis' haldin
of j golde ringe fra him quhilkis he laid' in wede of v s'

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' Alexander Rede
forspekar that Jonhne ramsay sal preiwe to morne befor the
balyeis that he land' ij bucatis and j cheir' in hary scottis schip and
falyeing' of his preiwe he sal pay the saidis gudis to Androw
Cristesone

Eodem die Johannes grig fecit constituit et ordinauit magistrum
Johannem lindesay suum legittimum procuratorem ad prosequendum thomam Waus
pro perturbio suo agend' defendend' respondend' et cetera promitten' de Rato
et grato cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

the xxvj day of august Jonhne ramsay preuit that he laide
in hary scottis schip ij bucatis and j cheir' to Androw cristesone

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxviij die
augusti quo Supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis assignit mastir Jonhne lindesay
procurator to Jonhne grig to Cum one Wednisday that next cumis and persew
thomas Waus and ordanit James leis and Androw nachtj sergeandis to warne
the saide thomas to Comper the saide day to ansuer to the saide procurator
as he that was warnit twys' obefor

The Sext day of September' the yer forsaid' patrik R leslie
become Souerte to Alexander menyeis in the nayme of erculis Rede for the
clame of jc keling' clamit avand' to the saide orculis be
William hil and Jonhne Dauisone in leithe and the safar as
may be lauchfullie recouerit apon thame Ande the saidez William
and Jonhne oblist thame be thar handis vphaldin to freithe the
said' patrik and kep him skathles tharanent

head.add: the covntis and pament of Robert' crage

div.p:
the saide day Robert crag producit his acquitance of v sevin li' scottis
money deliuerit to Adriane the gvnnar' at commavnd' of the tone befor
the aldirman Dauid mathesone Jonhne Colison and sere Jonhne Stirueling
Item deliuerit to philp of Dunbrek ane Scottis crovne / ane franche
crovne and xvj d' of Siluer Item deliuerit to the saide philp auchtene
s' and viij d'd' overwrites 's'.' at commavnd' of the tone' Item to the aldirman xviij s'
and viij d' Summa totalis huius xvj merkis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem viij die
Septembris quo Supra

Eodem die Johannes scheuale gallicus opidanus de Deip exoneravit
et quieteclamavit prepositum ballivos consules et communitatem huius burgi de contractu
prius inito inter ipsos ex vna et dictum Johannem partibus ab altera
penes empcionem et Solucionem mercanciarum suarum videlicet certi vinj
et ador et cetera

head.add: Anent the frethin of the tone of the Rest of the taxt

div.p:
The xxj day of September' yer forsaid' In the magdalane
yll it was deliuerit and ordanit be the aldirman and the consal
present for the tyme representand' the body of the Samyn
Anent the Rest of the taxt askit be Richarde Makdonell mas'
in our Soueran lordis nayme that the Officiaris being in office the
tyme of the extenting of the said taxt quhilkis Intromettit
with the saide taxt sal fre the tone and keipit Skathtles of
the said' taxt and pay the Rest of the Samyn

The xxv day of September' the yer forsaid' Alexander menyes
and Jonhne Cullane become Souerte and Caucionaris to sere Johne
ruthirfurd' aldirman and Robert Cullane balye for the proffitis keping
and malys of the land Ande the gudis of ayrschip eftir follouing to be
Responsal to the lauchful ayr and Ayris of vmquhil Robert
of turing to be pait to tham quhen the ayr or ayris
beis lauchfullie entirit in the said' land' liand' in the nethir
kirkgate be thar handis vphaldin and the said patrik oblist him
to freithe his saide Souertez eftir the tenor' of ane letter of our
Souerane lordis vndir his priue Sele directit to tharuppone
ThirFrom 'Thir' the text is added on page 829. The two parts are linked with a caret. ar the gudis of airschip pertening to the ayr or ayris of
vmquhil Robert of turing and Agnes Scrogis resavit be patrik
leslie In the first ane standand bed ane fedir bede and j boustar
price Sextene Schillingis ane bassyne tua s' ane tynnyn
quart price fiwe s' ane chandlar' price xij d' ane chargeour and ane
plat price vj s' ane brassin pot four s' ane Sput and ane labunt ij s'
ane pane sex s' and viij d' ane burd' and ane par of trestis
thre s' and Ane prevys' kyst price vj s' and viij d' prisit be suorne
prisaris

The last day of Septembre the yer forsaide In presens of Androw
Cullane balye mastir Androw crawfurd' Johne moir' sere John' Kynninmond'
Alexander gray and Androw nachtj sergeand Richerd Waus producit ane procuratorj
vndir the seil and manual subscripcion of mastir martyn Waus den'
of Ros' maid' be Jonet Waus douchtir till vmquhill
gilbert Waus and sistir to Jonhne Waus proportand' that the saide
Jonet hed maid' the said Richerd Waus hir procuratory session'
and assignay to rais' brevis of our Soueran lordis chapell of quhat
landis et cetera the said Jonhne deit last westit and sasit' et cetera the samyn to
mak Recovrit be and sesin tharof to recouer and tak as in the samyn
mair' fullie is contenit quhilkis procuratorj mastir henry makdonell
parsone of kirkcryst and sere Alexander moneymeill deponit in thar'
Saulis and conscience was trew apon the quhilkis the said Richard'
askit Instrument

div.head: heid Court
div.p:
Curia Capitalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
secundo die mensis Octobris anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo Septimo
quo die Sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent et cetera

Eodem die Johannes ruthifurd miles electus fuit in officium
prepositure pro anno Instante prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die Andreas Cullan senior Thomas leslie Roberts Cullan
et Richardus Waus electi fuerunt in Officium ballivorum pro anno Instante
prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die philippus Dunbrek Andreas nachty Jacobus leis et thomas
Symsone electi fuerunt in officium sergeandorum pro anno Instante prestitis solitis
Juramentis Cum huc condicione si aliquis ipsorum in excercione sui officij
deficerit aut aliquid minus iuste fecerit seu perturbium aut aliquid termine
commiserit hoc cognito deprauabitur de suo officio immediate et aliter in eodem
locabitur per prepositum et consilium

The saide day Androw cullan eldar oblist him to pay yerlie to the prior
of the frer predicatouris sex s' and aucht d' tharof xl d' at martymes and
xl d' at Witsonday for sere Alexander club for the annuel aucht to the
said prior and conuent of ane wast land liand' in the vuirkirkgat
pertening to ayris of vmquhil Robert

add.foreign: Alexander forbes Sponsa sua thomas prat Sponsa sua

div.p:
The saide day Alexander forbes be his avne tong graunt was in ane
amerciament of the court for the strubulance of thomas prat Ande in ane amerciament
of the court for strubulance of annabill gordone his Spous' Ande in amerciament
of the court for strubulance of Robert crag be ane Suorne assis' to
amend' as law will and forber' in tym to Cum

the saide day Elizibeth' the wyf of Alexander forbes in ane amerciament of the
strubulance of annabill gordone Spous' to thomas prat be ane suorne
assis' Robert blinsel forspekar the said Elizibeth conuikit for strubulance
of the said' thomas be ane Suorne assis' and to Amend' as law
wil and forber' in tym to Cum / ffor the quhilkis offence it was
deliuerit and ordanit be the said assis' that the saide Alexander suld' sit
done one his kne and ask the said thomas forgivnes in the court
And his said wif suld' be put in the goif ther to Reman
at the wil of the said' thomas and his Spous' Atour the said Elizibez
sal cum one Sonday that next cumis with ane Candil in hir hand'
of wax opin fatyt within the parys' kirk of abirdene in tym of the hie
mes' and ask the said annabil gordone forgivnes and offir the candil
to the haly blud licht Atour the saide Alexander and his wif sal be secludit
the mercat of abirdene for ane yer and fra bying or selling meil or
malt baking or brevyn Ande gif ony of tham brekis this deliuerance
or committis ony Offence til ony famous' persone of this burghe and beis
conuikit tharintil salbe secludit and expellit out of the tone

Eodem die continuatur Judicium processus domini Johannis Kinnynmond' vsque in feriam
sextam proximo futuro in consimili statu quo nunc stat

Eodem die continuatur Judicium processus magistri themannj crab vsque in feriam
sextam secunde ebdomite in consimili statu quo nunc stat

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Alexander fyf capellanus
altaris beate marie infra ecclesiam parochialem beati nicholaij situati et protestatus
fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu duorum s' sibi et dicto altarj
annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico viridi inter torrentem ex
orientali et terram quondam Alexandri Kintor ex occidentali ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringiible preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Willelmo leche Dauid
Colp et thoma Symsone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister Alexander fyf capellanus
ac procurator altaris beate marie virginis et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo Redditu duorum solidorum sibi et dicto altarj annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta
Jacente in vico viridi inter terram Johannis Wilson' Webstar' textoris ex australi et terram
alexandri mernoche ex boreali partibus ab altera Ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus testibus Willelmo leche Dauid
Colp et thoma Symsone seriando
